definitions.definition: used to show that there is a single one or very few of something, or that there are no others:
examples: I was the only person on the train.

definitions.definition: used to show that something is limited to not more than, or is not anything other than, the people, things, amount, or activity stated:
examples: At present these televisions are only available in Japan.

definitions.definition: used to show what is the single or main reason why something mentioned in the first part of the sentence cannot be performed or is not completely true:
examples: I'd invite Frances to the party, only (= but I will not because) I don't want her husband to come.
